Park and Suites Geneva Airport Hotel

hotels.name: Park and Suites Geneva Airport Hotel
hotels.short_description:
Situated in Ferney Voltaire in France, close to the Swiss border, the 3-star Ferney Voltaire apartment hotel offers 125 spacious, fitted rooms and suites with an outstanding view over Mont Blanc. Located only a few minutes from Geneva international airport, Palexpo, the United Nations building and the ARENA, the residence is a great choice for business or leisure. Geneva was once the home of Voltaire, the famous writer and philosopher and along with a rich cultural history, offers visitors the chance to experience all of the advantages of the border region. The hotel is an apart hotel offering great flexibility for short or long stays with that home from home experience.
Rates are not valid for nationals or passport holders of the following countries; Brazil.

hotels.name: NH Airport
hotels.short_description: NH Geneva Airport is a modern 4-star hotel offering convenient accommodation close to Geneva International Airport. Highlights include onsite dining, free Wi-Fi, a gym and a complimentary airport shuttle. The hotel is situated approximately 2km from the airport terminals. The historic city centre is a short distance away and features many places of interest such as the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral, the United Nations Geneva Office, Palais des Nations and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Vernier train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to the centre of Geneva. The hotel occupies a circular mid-rise complex featuring a brick facade. Facilities include a gym, sauna and bicycle hire, and a range of massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are 15sqm and decorated in warm colours with contemporary furniture design and hardwood floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, cable TV, a mini-bar, work desk, safe, tea and coffee equipment and an en-suite bathroom. Pavillon serves delicious international cuisine with many French and Mediterranean specialities, whilst the hotel's friendly bar offers a wide range of tasty drinks and snacks throughout the day. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Churchill
hotels.short_description: Hotel Churchill is a friendly 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Geneva. It boasts free Wi-Fi and a great location steps from the lake. Geneva Old Town is situated just south of the Rhone river and contains many narrow streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property featuring a lightly decorative facade with marble-effect panelling and bay windows. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are simply decorated in soft colours with patterned fabrics and classic furniture design. Amenities include cable TV, a mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.

hotels.name: Express By Holiday Inn
hotels.short_description: Holiday Inn Express Geneva Airport is a friendly 3-star property offering convenient accommodation close to Geneva International Airport. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a gym and a complimentary airport shuttle. The hotel is situated approximately 1km from the airport terminals. The historic city centre is a short distance away and features many places of interest such as the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral, the United Nations Geneva Office, Palais des Nations and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Vernier train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to central Geneva. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property featuring a grey, panelled facade. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are simply decorated in primary colours with light wood furniture and artwork on the walls. Amenities include air-conditioning, chargeable wired internet, satellite TV with pay-per-view content, work desk and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower. Guests can enjoy a relaxing drink in the hotel's friendly bar throughout the day, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service. Chargeable indoor parking is possible onsite.

selected.room_type: Double or Twin STANDARD - BED AND BREAKFAST

hotels.name: Best Western Chavannes De Bogis
hotels.type: Double or Twin STANDARD - BED AND BREAKFAST
hotels.address: Les Champs Blancs, Chavanne de Bogis 1279, Geneva
hotels.short_description: Best Western Chavannes De Bogis is a friendly 3-star hotel offering peaceful accommodation north of Geneva. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining, an outdoor pool, tennis courts and complimentary parking. Chavannes-de-Bogis is a charming, largely agricultural village located close to the French border in the pleasant countryside north of Geneva. Regional places of interest include Lake Geneva and several pleasant wooded parks. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to central Geneva. The hotel occupies a Y-shaped modern complex featuring a concrete and glass facade. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, tennis courts and a children's playground. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with muted colours, parquet flooring, light wood furniture and artwork above the bed. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk, safe and an en-suite bathroom. Bistrot Capanna serves a wide range of international dishes, drinks, tapas and pastries throughout the day, whilst the more formal Le Restaurant des Arts offers exquisite regional cuisine in an inviting, modern space. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service.

hotels.name: Suitehotel Genève
hotels.short_description: Location. Suite Novotel Geneve is located close to Geneva Palexpo, Ariana Museum, and International Museum of the Red Cross and Red Crescent. Nearby points of interest also include United Nations European Headquarters and World Trade Organization Headquarters. Hotel Features. Recreational amenities include a fitness facility. Wireless Internet access is available in public areas. A bar/lounge is open for drinks. The hotel serves Buffet breakfasts surcharges apply. Guest parking is limited, and available on a limited first come, first served basis surcharge. Additional property amenities include a rooftop terrace, multilingual staff, and secure parking. Guestrooms. 86 air conditioned guestrooms at Suite Novotel Geneve feature complimentary bottled water and safes. Wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. In addition to desks and complimentary newspapers, guestrooms offer direct dial phones. Satellite television is provided. Rooms also include blackout drapes/curtains and clock radios. Guests may request in room massages, irons/ironing boards, and wake up calls. Guestrooms are all non smoking. Notifications and Fees:The following mandatory hotel imposed fees are charged and collected by the hotel either at check in or check out. A city/local tax will be charged Resort fee: CHF 2.95 per person, per nightHotel resort fee inclusions:Airport shuttleThe above list may not be comprehensive. Mandatory hotel imposed fees may not include tax and are subject to change. The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check in, or check out. Self parking: CHF 15 per nightPet fee: CHF 10 per nightLate check out: CHF 106Fee for in room wireless Internet: CHF 50 rates may varyBuffet breakfast: CHF 11 per person approximate amount The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

hotels.name: Movenpick & Casino
hotels.type: Classic Queen - Early Saver Room Only - 30pct
hotels.short_description: Moevenpick Hotel & Casino Geneva is a modern 5-star property offering contemporary accommodation close to Geneva International Airport. Highlights include a modern fitness centre, casino and several dining options. The hotel is situated approximately 1km from the airport terminals. The historic city centre is a short distance away and features many places of interest such as the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral, the United Nations Geneva Office, Palais des Nations and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneve-Aeroport train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to the centre of Geneva. The hotel occupies a modern, high-rise property with a glass-panelled facade. Facilities include a modern fitness centre, gift shop and casino. A range of beauty treatments are available on request. Business rooms are 25sqm and decorated in a modern style with gently patterned fabrics. Amenities include air-conditioning, cable TV with on-demand content, a mini-bar, safe, Nespresso coffee machine, mp3 dock and free wired internet. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Restaurant Latitude offers Swiss and international gourmet cuisine in a modern space or on the summer terrace. Kamome serves a range of Japanese dishes in a chic room stylishly decorated in pale wood. Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks, light meals and live entertainment in the various cafes and bars. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Des Horlogers
hotels.short_description: Hotel Des Horlogers is a charming 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation south of Geneva. It boasts free Wi-Fi. Plan-les-Ouates is a partly industrial suburb situated just south of Geneva. It is home to the offices of several well-known luxury watch manufacturers, including Rolex. Nearby places of interest include the historic Forte D'Arare House. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to central Geneva. The hotel occupies a simple low-rise property featuring a lightly decorative white facade. The interiors boast an impressive collection of traditional watchmakers' tools. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in an elegant, simple style with warm colours, patterned fabrics and classic furniture design. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.***Please note guests are required to check-in between 07:00-22:00. After-hours arrivals will have to dial a telephone number for assistance.***.

Highlights include free Wi-Fi, an onsite bar and a good location within walking distance of the well-connected Geneve-Cornavin station. Le Grand Pre is an affluent residential district situated north of the city centre, boasting many green spaces. Nearby places of interest include the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Museum, the United Nations Geneva Office, Palais des Nations and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a traditional mid-rise property featuring a lightly decorative, white facade with wrought iron faux balconies. Facilities include bicycle hire, and free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are 16-24sqm and decorated in an elegant, traditional style with patterned fabrics and classic furniture design. Amenities include air-conditioning, chargeable Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a relaxing drink or snack at the hotel's inviting bar throughout the day, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Ramada Encore Hotel
hotels.short_description: Ramada Encore Geneva is a friendly 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in south Geneva. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and good transport links. The hotel is situated next to La Praille shopping centre and close to Stade de Geneve. There are several bus stops located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a predominantly white facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 24sqm and decorated in a bright, modern style. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen TV, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The Hub Restaurant serves international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Guests can also enjoy a drink in pleasant surroundings at The Hub Bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Moderne
hotels.short_description: This hotel is ideally located in the very heart of Geneva and lies very close to the main train station, Geneva International Airport (around 6 km away) and the UN Centre (some 2 km away). Guests will find the main restaurants, shops and public transport links all only a few steps away, and it is walking distance from all major points of the city. This city business hotel was renovated in 2006 and comprises a total of 55 rooms spread over 5 floors. Facilities available to guests include a lobby area, a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, a currency exchange facility, a lift, a breakfast room, a TV lounge, Internet access and a laundry service.From the Airport or from the main highway (coming from France or inside Switzerland), guests should travel in the direction of Cornavin (Genevas main train station). Once arriving in the area of Cornavin take the Rue de Lausanne and travel towards the Lake (South). Follow the signs to the hotel, which will lead to Rue de Berne. The hotel is at number 1, Rue de Berne.

hotels.name: Edelweiss Manotel Hotel
hotels.short_description: Edelweiss Manotel is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Geneva. Highlights include daily live entertainment, free Wi-Fi and a great location close to Lake Geneva. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property featuring a decorative, carved wood entrance. The wood-panelled interiors are furnished in the style of a traditional Swiss cottage. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 20sqm and decorated in a simple style with soft colours, patterned fabrics and classic furniture design. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with on-demand content, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The hotel restaurant serves traditional Swiss cuisine accompanied every evening by live yodelling. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.

Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property featuring a colourful, panelled facade. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a mini-bar, work desk and safe. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: Hotel Pax
hotels.short_description: Hotel Pax The Hotel Pax rated 2x000D star is a mid size hotel in Geneve. No on site car parking is available at the hotel, however off site car parking is available. Dining is available at the hotel, which has it's own restaurant. Rooms at the Hotel Pax. A hairdryer, iron and ironing board are provided in every room. Rooms have wireless internet access available. Additional Info. An airport shuttle service is available from the hotel. Pets are welcome at the hotel. A concierge service is available to guests.

hotels.name: Suisse Geneve
hotels.short_description: Property Location You'll be centrally located in Geneva with a stay at Hotel Suisse, minutes from Flower Clock and Saint-Pierre Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Rath Art Museum and Grand Theatre Opera.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 62 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature handheld showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include direct-dial phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.Dining Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Parking (subject to charges) is conveniently located nearby.

hotels.name: Crowne Plaza Geneva
hotels.short_description: Crowne Plaza Geneva is a modern 4-star hotel offering convenient accommodation close to Geneva International Airport. Highlights include a fine international restaurant, a gym, a complimentary airport shuttle and an excellent location close to Balexert shopping centre. The hotel is situated approximately 1km from the airport terminals. The historic city centre is a short distance away and features many places of interest such as the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral, the United Nations Geneva Office, Palais des Nations and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneve-Aeroport train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to central Geneva. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise complex featuring a concrete and glass facade. Facilities include a small gym, a hair and beauty salon and a relaxing shaded terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in various colour schemes with classic furniture and artwork on the walls. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV with pay-per-view movies, a mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub. Seventy5 serves urban-inspired international cuisine a contemporary setting with large windows, whilst less formal dining is offered during the day at the partly al-fresco Le Jardin. Guests can also enjoy delicious cocktails, fine wines and a range of international beers at Le Bar throughout the day and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service. Chargeable indoor parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: IBIS GENEVA CENTRE NATIONS HOTEL
hotels.short_description: Opened in February 2013, the brand new 2star Ibis Geneva Centre Nations is located in the centre of Geneva, just 800 metres from Cornavin Train Station. It offers modern en-suite rooms with a flat-screen cable TV, as well as free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel. Guests of the Centre Nations Ibis benefit from a 24-hour reception and a bar serving drinks and snacks around the clock. Lake Geneva and the international organisations are just 2 km away, and Geneva Airport is 4 km away. Public transport in Geneva is free for hotel guests.

hotels.name: Strasbourg-Univers
hotels.short_description: This friendly hotel is located in the midst of the business district in a quiet street just opposite the Cornavin train station, yet only a few minutes walk away from the lakeside and the Mont-Blanc pedestrian precinct. Take a short stroll via the Mont-Blanc Bridge in order to discover the old town of Geneva and its numerous shops and restaurants. Traditional hospitality is combined with an air of tranquillity inviting the guest to enjoy a relaxing and peaceful stay in the heart of Geneva. The 53 bedrooms are all decently sized and pleasantly decorated and have the usual facilities of a good 3-star hotel. This charming hotel is highly recommended. (Each guest will be given a travel card for free transportation in Geneva at check-in).

hotels.name: Jade Manotel
hotels.short_description:
Following the principles of Feng Shui, this hotel comprises 6 floors with a total of 47 rooms. Amongst the facilities count a foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, safes, a currency exchange facility and lifts. In addition, there is a public Internet terminal with free WLAN access as well as laundry and room services on offer to guests. A car park and garage facilities are available to those arriving at the hotel by car.Guests may select their breakfast from an ample buffet.American Express, Diners Club, MasterCard and VISA are accepted as methods of payment.
This hotel is located at the heart of Geneva, close to Lake Geneva and the train station as well as within a short distance of many shops, restaurants, lively bars and nightclubs. The transfer time to the airport takes around 15 minutes.
Each of the modern, spacious rooms come with an en suite bathroom with hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, satellite/ cable TV, a radio, Internet access and a hire safe. Furthermore, each has a minibar, a double bed and central heating as standard.

hotels.name: Novotel Geneve Centre
hotels.short_description:
מלון נובוטל ז'נבה סנטר (Novotel Geneve Centre) הנו מלון 4 כוכבים מודרני השוכן במרכז ז'נבה. 
מתקני המלון כוללים: מסעדה, גישה חופשית לאינטרנט אלחוטי, חדר כושר ומיקום מעולה בקרבת אגם ז'נבה.
אזור התחנה המרכזית הנו אזור עתיק המאופיין ברחובות רחבים ומגוון בניינים היסטוריים. באזור מגוון מסעדות, חנויות ומתחמי בילוי.
אטרקציות בקרבת מקום: מוזיאון Barbier-Mueller, מוזיאון פלאס נובה (the cultural hub Place Neuve), קתדרלת סנט פייר מימי הביניים ואגם ז'נבה ובו המזרקה הגבוהה בעולם, Jet d'Eau.
תחנת הרכבת Geneva Cornavin  נמצאת בקרבת מקום ומספקת גישה מהירה ונוחה ליעדים עיקריים ברחבי העיר.

Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. Amenities include a satellite HDTV, mini-bar, work desk and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. The hotel restaurant serves a wide range of regional cuisine, pizzas and classic international dishes. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

This hotel is within close proximity of Museum of Art and History and Marionette Museum.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and minibars, and housekeeping is provided daily.Dining A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk.

hotels.name: Drake And Longchamp (ex. Minotel)
hotels.short_description: Overview: Drake Longchamp is a friendly 3-star property offering basic accommodation near the heart of Geneva. Highlights include in-room kitchenettes and a good location close to Lake Geneva and the international organisations.Location: The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations.Exterior: The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise property featuring prominent use of glass.Rooms: Standard rooms are approximately 28sqm and decorated in a simple style with soft colours, light wood furniture and artwork on the walls. Amenities include satellite TV, a well-equipped kitchenette and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower.RestaurantsAndBars: Every room contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity.FamilyInformation: OtherInformation: The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite (reservation needed).

hotels.name: Kipling Hotel
hotels.short_description: Kipling Manotel is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, an onsite bar and a good location close to excellent transport links. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property featuring a flat facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 20sqm and decorated in a traditional style with rich colours, patterned fabrics and hardwood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with on-demand content, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Guests can enjoy a relaxing drink at the hotel bar throughout the day. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Cornavin
hotels.address: 23 blvd James Fazy | Gare de Cornavin
hotels.short_description: Overview: Hotel Cornavin is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include a modern fitness centre, sauna and free Wi-Fi.Location: The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations.Exterior: The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building with a minimalist facade and a modern upwards extension featuring glass-panelling.Rooms: Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with contemporary furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV with on-demand content, a mini-bar and safe.RestaurantsAndBars: A buffet breakfast is provided every morning in the top-floor breakfast room, offering panoramic views of the city and Lake Geneva. The hotel bar offers guests a relaxing spot to enjoy a drink. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity.FamilyInformation: OtherInformation: The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: La Cour Des Augustins
hotels.short_description:
Tucked away in Geneva's Latin Quarter, La Cour des Augustins is an innovatively designed hotel with a distinctly urban style. It modernises the boutique hotel concept, combining architectural heritage with contemporary interior design.
Far from the city's busy main roads and right in the heart of Genevan life, guests can easily stroll through the Old City, the art and business districts, and the charming Sardinian village of Carouge.
The concept was designed in collaboration with the Swiss designer Philippe Cramer, based on the idea of personalised and diverse spaces. The hotel harmoniously and subtly blends modern and classic design. Composed of 16 rooms and 24 suites that masterfully combine design, comfort and technology, the hotel is comprised of two buildings from the 1850s. Both building were entirely renovated in 2006 and are connected by an interior courtyard. Each room and suite has a unique and specific style, with contemporary designer furniture and objects. 
Guests should note that local city tax is not included in the rate booked. This will be charged directly to guests by the hotel and payable at check in.

hotels.name: Windsor
hotels.short_description: The 3* Windsor Hotel is a great value for money hotel with an excellent location right in the heart of Geneva. Just a few minutes walk from the Cornavin train station and the famous and spectacular water jet! All 56 bedrooms are all cozy and clean and have either a bathtub or a shower as well as telephone and cable/satellite television. If guests want to relax they can either enjoy a drink at the bar or watch television in a more secluded part of the lounge area. A variety of restaurants can be found around the hotel. (Each guest will be given a travel card for free transportation in Geneva at check-in). The hotel is currently going trough renovation therefore the guest will be checked in from the new entry side which is based in following street 12 Rue de Neuchatel.

hotels.name: Design Hotel F6 (ex. Quality City Centre)
hotels.short_description: Location. Design Hotel F6 is located in Geneva, close to La Perle la Lac, United Nations European Headquarters, and Ariana Museum. Nearby points of interest also include Jet d'Eau and International Museum of the Red Cross and Red Crescent. Hotel Features. Recreational amenities include a sauna, a fitness facility, and a steam room. Wireless Internet access is available in public areas. Guest parking is available for a surcharge. Business services and concierge services are available. Additional property amenities include multilingual staff and laundry facilities. Guestrooms. 40 guestrooms at Design Hotel F6 feature iPod docking stations and minibars. Wireless Internet access is complimentary. In addition to desks and safes, guestrooms offer direct dial phones. Satellite television is provided. Rooms also include coffee/tea makers and clock radios. Notifications and Fees:The following mandatory hotel imposed fees are charged and collected by the hotel either at check in or check out. City/local tax: CHF 2.95 per person, per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Mandatory hotel imposed fees may not include tax and are subject to change. Additional fees and deposits may be charged by the property at time of service, check in, or check out.

hotels.name: Hotel Royal Manotel
hotels.short_description: Royal Manotel is a friendly 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include fine dining, free Wi-Fi, onsite wellness facilities and a good location close to the well-connected Geneve-Cornavin station. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property featuring a light-coloured, panelled facade. Facilities include a small gym, sauna and steam room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Executive rooms are approximately 35sqm and decorated in rich colours with patterned fabrics and classic furniture design. Amenities include air-conditioning, free wired internet, a flat-screen TV with on-demand content, Nespresso coffee machine, mini-bar, comfortable sitting area, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature bathrobes and slippers. Le Duo serves an array of exquisite Swiss dishes and fine wines, its menu encompassing gourmet, contemporary cuisine and traditional regional favourites. Guests can also enjoy delicious drinks and snacks at the relaxed Bogie's Bar throughout the day, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Hotel Le Warwick
hotels.short_description:
The landmark choice among Geneva hotels, Hotel Warwick Genevaâs high standards of services combined with comfortable rooms and suites, prominent exposure, excellent dining facilities, multi-purpose conference rooms and the legendary Swiss hospitality will make any stay in Geneva an unforgettable experience.
This Geneva hotel features elegant rooms and suites set in fine contemporary dÃ©cor with classical wood features for a most soothing ambiance, and all offering modern amenities including complimentary free Wifi Internet access. Guests will enjoy the stylish elegance of the on-site TÃ©sÃ©o restaurant, a subtle and contemporary dÃ©cor to relax and to be pampered by culinary delicacies. At the trendy TÃ©sÃ©o Bar, guests will find a wide selection of innovative cocktails and Swiss wines. Its harmonious and cosy atmosphere provide the perfect setting for a casual rendezvous, a business meeting or just a place to relax while enjoying the lively evening ambiance.
The hotel provides one of the best locations in the very centre of Geneva and is the perfect place to stay while visiting Geneva and the surrounding areas. Directly across from Cornavin Station, the cityâs main railway station, and within 10 driving minutes from the airport, the hotel is also the ideal venue to meet while in Geneva.
Lake Geneva, the historical city centre, the museums, the banking sector and the prestigious shopping districts are all within walking distance from the hotel.
The excellent public transport facilities, located right outside of the hotel, offer quick connections to the main congress and convention centres (Geneva Palexpo & CICG). Its proximity to most International Organizations to the headquarters of the United Nations makes this hotel a favorite venue for both business and leisure travelers.
The complimentary UNIRESO pass offered by the hotel upon arrival permits guests to use all public transportation
free of charge within the City of Geneva.

hotels.name: ibis Styles Geneve Gare (ex. Savoy)
hotels.short_description:
מלון איביס סטייל ז'נבה גאר (ibis Styles Geneva Gare) הנו מלון 3 כוכבים השוכן במרכז העיר, בסמוך לתחנת הרכבת המרכזית.
אטרקציות נוספות בקרבת מקום: אגם ז'נבה, העיר העתיקה, כיכר נוטראדם ועיקר האטרקציות התיירותיות של העיר.
המלון אשר שופץ כולו, שוכן בבניין עתיק מהמאה ה-19 ומתקניו כוללים מסעדה ומזנון ארוחת בוקר.
תחבורה ציבורית: התחנה המרכזית של העיר נמצאת בקרבת מקום ומספקת גישה מהירה ונוחה ליעדים עיקריים בחרבי העיר.

hotels.name: Intercontinental Geneva (Deluxe)
hotels.short_description: InterContinental Geneva is a modern 5-star hotel offering luxury accommodation near the heart of Geneva. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, fine dining, a 24-hour gym, outdoor pool, chic spa and a great location steps from Ariana Park. The grand Palais des Nations is home to the United Nations Office at Geneva, which is the headquarters of many distinguished international organizations including the WHO and the WTO. Nearby places of interest include Ariana Park, the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Museum and the majestic Lake Geneva. Geneve-Secheron train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century high-rise property featuring a largely glass-panelled facade. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, modern fitness centre, steam room, sauna, Jacuzzi and a luxurious spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are 32sqm and decorated in strong colours with elegant furniture design. They boast enviable views of Mont Blanc or Lake Geneva. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV with pay-per-view content, a mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and bathrobes. Woods is decorated entirely in elegant, natural materials and serves exquisite contemporary cuisine and fine wines, its dishes crafted from the freshest seasonal ingredients. Guests can also enjoy an array of light meals, live music, refined cocktails and sumptuous decor at Les Nations, located in the lobby, or at the more intimate O'Bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Eastwest Hotel
hotels.short_description: Property Location With a stay at Eastwest Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Geneva, steps from The Library In English and Sisi Monument. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Rousseau Island and Notre Dame Basilica.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 41 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.Dining Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Geneva? This hotel has facilities measuring 24 square feet (2 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

hotels.name: Auteuil
hotels.short_description: Hotel Auteuil Manotel is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, an onsite bar, gym and a great location close to the well-connected Geneva Cornavin train station. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property featuring a concrete and glass facade. Facilities include a modern fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 22-25sqm and decorated in strong colours with patterned fabrics and artwork above the bed. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV with pay-per-view content, a mini-bar, work desk, safe and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a relaxing drink in the inviting hotel bar, which boasts a charming fireplace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Hotel Epsom Manotel
hotels.short_description: Hotel N'vY is a modern 4-star property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include modish decor, free Wi-Fi and a great location close to the lake. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a chic modern property with a largely glass facade. The interiors showcase contemporary 'boho-chic' design. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a chic, modern style with various materials, rich colours and contemporary furniture design. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy delicious contemporary cuisine in the hotel's stylish restaurant, whilst a wide range of drinks and snacks are available throughout the day at the Grab&Go Bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Hotel Rotary
hotels.short_description: Hotel Rotary is a charming 4-star property offering upmarket accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, an elegant restaurant and a great location close to the lake and the Old Town. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies an elegant mid-rise property featuring a flat, yellow facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are elegantly decorated in a traditional style with rich colours, antique furniture and patterned wallpaper, fabrics and carpet. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub. Le Caprice serves exquisite French and international cuisine in a charming space featuring painted murals on the walls. Guests can enjoy a relaxing drink and live music at the hotel's inviting bar, Le Rotary, throughout the day, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Bristol
hotels.short_description:
מלון בריסטול (Hotel Bristol) הנו מלון 4 כוכבים יוקרתי השוכן במרכז ז'נבה.
מתקני המלון כוללים: מסעדה, חדר כושר מודרני, מתחם ספא ומיקום מעולה בקרבת אגם ז'נבה.
אזור התחנה המרכזית הנו אזור עתיק המאופיין ברחובות רחבים ומגוון בניינים היסטוריים. באזור מגוון מסעדות, חנויות ומתחמי בילוי.
אטרקציות בקרבת מקום: מוזיאון Barbier-Mueller, מוזיאון פלאס נובה (the cultural hub Place Neuve), קתדרלת סנט פייר מימי הביניים ואגם ז'נבה ובו המזרקה הגבוהה בעולם, Jet d'Eau.
תחנת הרכבת Geneva Cornavin  נמצאת בקרבת מקום ומספקת גישה מהירה ונוחה ליעדים עיקריים ברחבי העיר.

hotels.name: Mon-Repos Swiss Q Hotel
hotels.short_description: Only 400 metres from the World Trade Organisation, this 3 star superior hotel enjoys is located on the banks of Lake Geneva. It offers free use of public transport in Geneva and comfortable modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. All rooms are decorated in a contemporary colour scheme and offer a minibar and flat-screen TV. After an eventful day, guests can unwind in Mon Repos Hotel's lounge area or enjoy a drink at the hotel's bar. The hotel is privately owned and recently renovated offering a very high standard of accommodation in a prime location.

hotels.name: Eden
hotels.short_description: Hotel Eden is a traditional 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Geneva. Highlights include fine dining, free Wi-Fi and a great location overlooking the lake. The grand Palais des Nations is home to the United Nations Office at Geneva, which is the headquarters of many distinguished international organizations including the WHO and the WTO. Nearby places of interest include Ariana Park, the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Museum and the majestic Lake Geneva. Geneve-Secheron train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies an elegant 20th-century property featuring a lightly decorative, curved facade with prominent stonework, varying textures and balconies on every floor. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in various colour schemes with classic furniture design and patterned fabrics. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. The hotel restaurant serves delicious seasonal dishes and fine regional wines in an elegant, traditional space, whilst guests can enjoy a relaxing drink throughout at the day at the inviting lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: President Wilson
hotels.short_description: President Wilson Geneva, a Luxury Collection Hotel is a stunning 5-star property offering luxury accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include fine dining, an outdoor pool, spa, 24-hour gym, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location overlooking the majestic waters of Lake Geneva. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property featuring an angular, concrete and glass facade. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, modern fitness centre, boutique shop, hair salon and a charming spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Junior suites (Lake View) are 65sqm and decorated in a modern style with patterned fabrics and hardwood furniture. They boast stunning views of Lake Geneva and the majestic Alps beyond it. Amenities include air-conditioning, a Bang & Olufsen TV, Nespresso coffee machine, iPod dock, mini-bar, comfortable sitting area, work desk and safe. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and separate walk-in shower. Bayview serves gourmet contemporary cuisine and fine wines in a chic, modern space boasting stunning views of the lake and the Jet d'Eau. Guests can also enjoy exquisite Middle Eastern dishes in the sumptuous Arabesque or casual international dining at seasonal Poolgarden. The opulent So Caviar Bar offers delicious snacks and refined champagnes, whilst stunning cocktails, light meals and contemporary art are available at the ultra-modish Glow. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable indoor parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Le Richemond
hotels.short_description: Property Location With a stay at Le Richemond, you'll be centrally located in Geneva, walking distance from Paquis Baths and close to Flower Clock. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Barbier-Mueller Archeology Museum and Tavel House History Museum.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 109 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your bed comes with cotton sheets and down blankets. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).Dining Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference/meeting rooms, small meeting rooms, and a ballroom. A train station pick-up service is complimentary, and parking (subject to charges) is conveniently located nearby.

hotels.name: RICHEMOND ROCCOFORTE
hotels.short_description: Le Richemond is a traditional 5-star hotel offering luxury accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include fine dining, a modern spa complex by Sisley, elegant decor and an excellent location overlooking Monument Brunswick and Lake Geneva. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a large 19th-century mid-rise property featuring a decorative facade with wrought iron faux balconies on every floor. Facilities include a modern fitness centre, sauna, steam room and a large spa complex by Sisley offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises (up to 256kb). Premium Lake View rooms are 40sqm and decorated in an elegant, modern style with pastel colours, contemporary furniture and patterned fabrics and wallpaper. Guests in these rooms benefit from a balcony offering stunning views of Lake Geneva and the surrounding mountains. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV with on-demand content, mini-bar, work desk and safe. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub, a walk-in shower and complimentary L'Occitane toiletries. Le Jardin serves fine Mediterranean cuisine created using the finest seasonal produce, whilst Le Bar boasts Art Deco design and offers light meals, snacks, live music and an extensive wine, champagne and cocktail menu. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: Best Western Astoria
hotels.short_description: Hotel Astoria is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Geneva. It boasts a friendly pub and restaurant and a great location steps from the well-connected Geneve-Cornavin station. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a mid-rise property with a flat, light-coloured facade. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are simply decorated in various colour schemes with classic furniture design and artwork on the walls. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV with on-demand content, mini-bar, work desk and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. Britannia Pub & Restaurant serves informal international dishes in a friendly atmosphere offering live music and televised sporting events. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: Swissotel Metropole
hotels.short_description:
מלון סוויסוטל מטרופול (SwissotelMetropole) הנו מלון 5 כוכבים יוקרתי במרכז ז'נבה.
מתקני המלון כוללים: מסעדה, חדר כושר ומיקום מעולה בקרבת אגם ז'נבה והגנים האנגליים.
אזור העיר העתיקה מאופיין ברחובות רחבים ומגוון בניינים היסטוריים. באזור מגוון מסעדות, חנויות ומתחמי בילוי.
אטרקציות בקרבת מקום: מוזיאון Barbier-Mueller, מוזיאון פלאס נובה (the cultural hub Place Neuve), קתדרלת סנט פייר מימי הביניים ואגם ז'נבה ובו המזרקה הגבוהה בעולם, Jet d'Eau.
תחבורה ציבורית: אוטובוסים מקומיים מספקים גישה מהירה ונוחה ליעדים עיקריים ברחבי העיר.

hotels.name: Grand Kempinski
hotels.short_description: Grand Hotel Kempinski Geneva is a modern 5-star property offering luxury accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include fine dining, extensive wellness facilities, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location overlooking Lake Geneva and the Jet d'Eau. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property featuring a sleek, predominantly glass facade. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a modern fitness centre, yoga studio, steam room and a modern spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe Lake View rooms are 30sqm and elegantly decorated in muted colours with contemporary furniture design and artwork above the bed. They boast floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony offering stunning views of Lake Geneva. Amenities include air-conditioning, an iPod dock, a mini-bar, safe and flat-screen satellite TV with pay-per-view content. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. FloorTwo serves exquisite Mediterranean cuisine in a chic space boasting stunning views over Lake Geneva towards the Alps. Guests can also enjoy delicious international dishes at Le Grill, stunning Chinese specialities at Tse Yang or relaxed, casual dining at the inviting FloorTwo Lounge. FloorTwo Bar offers refined cocktails, light meals, fine wines and stunning views, whilst the modish Java Club boasts an extensive drinks menu, live DJs and a large dancefloor. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: DAngleterre
hotels.short_description: Hotel d'Angleterre is an elegant 5-star property offering luxury accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include fine dining, free Wi-Fi, a modern fitness centre and an excellent location steps from Lake Geneva. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies a charming 19th-century corner property featuring a mansard roof and a decorative facade with wrought iron balconies. Facilities include a modern fitness centre and sauna. A range of massages and wellness treatments are available on request and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Exclusive Lake rooms are approximately 37sqm and decorated in a variety of colour schemes, all boasting sumptuous fabrics, elegant furniture and original artwork on the walls. Guests in these rooms benefit from enviable views of the majestic Lake Geneva and the mountains that surround it. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV with on-demand content, iPod dock, mini-bar, complimentary magazines, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature bathrobes, slippers and complimentary Penhaligon's toiletries. Windows Restaurant serves fine international cuisine accompanied by an extensive wine list and stunning views of Lake Geneva. The Leopard Bar offers a wide variety of exquisite drinks as well as snacks, informal meals, live music and televised sporting events. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: La Reserve
hotels.short_description: La Reserve Geneva Hotel & Spa is a chic 5-star property offering luxury accommodation north of Geneva. Highlights include sleek design, fine dining, a large spa complex and a peaceful location close to Lake Geneva. Bellevue is a small residential suburb just north of the city. This green lakeside area boasts many open spaces and excellent road and public transport links. Les Tuileries train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to central Geneva. The hotel is housed in a low-rise complex featuring a terracotta facade. Facilities include a large spa complex with a modern fitness centre, sauna, steam room, beauty salon, sunbeds and two swimming pools (indoor and outdoor). A range of massages and wellness treatments are available on request. The hotel also boasts outdoor tennis courts, watersports equipment, a children's playground and luxury gift shop. Leman Suites are 55sqm and decorated in a luxurious, modern style with rich colours, parquet flooring, hardwood furniture and sumptuous fabrics. Amenities include air-conditioning, chargeable Wi-Fi, a TV, work desk and separate sitting area overlooking the lake. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and a separate walk-in shower. The elegant Le Loti restaurant is decorated in leather and bamboo and serves fine international cuisine, whilst the sleek Le Tse-Fung offers exquisite Chinese dishes in a luxuriant space filled with velvet and hardwood furniture. Cafe Lauren, located within the spa complex, provides guests with a range of healthy meals, whilst the cocktails and sumptuous environs of Le Bar make it the perfect choice for guests wishing to relax before or after dining. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Beau Rivage
hotels.short_description: Overview: Beau Rivage is a luxury 5-star hotel offering sumptuous waterfront accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include a well-equipped fitness centre, Michelin-starred dining and an excellent location on the shores of Lake Geneva.Location: The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations.Exterior: The hotel is housed in a grand property built in 1865, boasting superb views of Lake Geneva and the Alps.Rooms: Prestige Suites (Lake View) are approximately 45sqm and elegantly decorated, boasting a large sitting area with coffee table. Amenities include air-conditioning, soundproofing, a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The marble bathrooms boast a bathtub, separate walk-in shower, bathrobes, slippers and Clarins toiletries.RestaurantsAndBars: Le Chat-Botte serves inventive French dishes created by Michelin-starred chef Dominique Gauthier and boasts a summer terrace with stunning views of Lake Geneva. Patara offers fine Thai cuisine, while guests can enjoy afternoon tea or a quiet evening drink in L'Atrium Bar.FamilyInformation: OtherInformation: The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable valet parking is possible onsite.

selected.room_type: Superior Room 1 Queen Bed River View

hotels.name: Mandarin Oriental
hotels.type: Superior Room 1 Queen Bed River View
hotels.short_description:
This boutique hotel occupies a stunning and charming building. It houses elegant and art deco guestrooms, distinctively styled with fine furniture, and offer soothing views of the River Rhone. The hotel is a perfect amalgamation of old world charm and contemporary luxuries.
The hotel is located right on the bank of River Rhone. The hotel is close to many tourist places such as Jet dâEau Fountain, English Garden, Flower Clock, Rath Museum and Patek Philippe Museum. It is easily accessible from Geneva International Airport (GVA).

selected.room_type: CLASSIC ROOM 1 KING BED GARDEN VIEW NON-REFUNDABLE

hotels.name: De La Paix Geneva
hotels.type: CLASSIC ROOM 1 KING BED GARDEN VIEW NON-REFUNDABLE
hotels.short_description: Hotel de la Paix is an elegant 5-star property offering luxury accommodation in the heart of Geneva. Highlights include a Michelin-starred restaurant, modern fitness centre, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location steps from Lake Geneva. The area surrounding the central station is historic and contains many wide streets and traditional mid-rise properties. Nearby places of interest include the Barbier-Mueller Museum, the cultural hub Place Neuve, the medieval St. Pierre Cathedral and Lake Geneva, which boasts magnificent mountain views and the world's tallest fountain, Jet d'Eau. Geneva Cornavin train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Geneva destinations. The hotel occupies an elegant 19th-century corner property featuring a mansard roof and a decorative facade with wrought iron balconies on every floor. Facilities include a modern fitness centre. Junior Suites (Full Lake View) are 43-58sqm and decorated in a variety of colour schemes, all featuring thick fabrics and contemporary furniture design. Guests in these rooms benefit from a large balcony overlooking the majestic Lake Geneva. Amenities include air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV, Nespresso coffee machine, iPod dock, complimentary mineral water, a small sitting area, work desk and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub, separate walk-in shower and complimentary Annick Goutal toiletries. The Michelin-starred Vertig'O restaurant serves gourmet French and Mediterranean cuisine with a menu by Jerome Manifacier. The luxurious Nobel Bar offers an exquisite range of fine wines, cocktails and appetizers in a sumptuously decorated space featuring mahogany floors, contemporary artwork and antique furniture. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Des Bergues Geneva
hotels.short_description:
מלון פור סיזנס דה ברג ז'נבה (Four Seasons des Bergues Geneva) הנו מלון 5 כוכבים יוקרתי הממוקם על גדות אגם ז'נבה.
המלון שוכן בבניין עתיק ומהווה נקודת ציון היסטורית לתקופת הבל אפוק.
מבנה המלון שופץ ושוחזר כליל וחדריו עוצבו על ידי מעצב הפנים הנודע פייר איב רושון
 (Pierre-Yves Rochon)  אשר הקפיד לשלב יוקרה קלאסית עם טכנולוגיה מודרנית. 
החדרים כוללים: מסך טלוויזיה שטוח וערוצי לווין, גישה חופשית לאינטרנט אלחוטי, נגן DVD, טלפון וחדר רחצה מרווח הכולל אמבטיה משיש, מתלה מגבות מחומם ומוצרי טיפוח יוקרתיים.
מתקני המלון כוללים מסעדת גורמה, חדר כושר הפעיל 24 שעות, בריכה, מתחם ספא, שירות חדרים, שירותי חנייה ודוכן קונסיירז'.
באזור המלון ניתן למצוא מגוון מסעדות גורמה, חנויות יוקרה, מוזיאונים, מבנים ממשלתיים חשובים ומתחמי בילוי.
